Posts.Content: Wondering if I could get a bit of advice here. Im 32 years old, and for A little while now Ive been having some issues. Usually only at night when getting ready for bed, Ill frel like I have to go to the bathroom, and when I go its only a few drops. This happens 2-3 times while Im in bed and relaxing and waiting to actually fall asleep. Recently, when going to the bathroom, its been taking a while to start a flow, as well as sometimes itll be a weak flow. Most shocking though, is I recently wet the bed. This, after I got up 2-3 times before actually falling asleep and doing the normal I gotta pee, but its barely anything routine. Now, Im an active guy. I lift weights 3-4 days a week, but as well... I dont necessarily have a strict and clean diet. Also, my right testicle has been bothersome recently, but I dont think its swollen or anything. Any advice or thoughts at all would be greatly appreciated. Im not one to worry about something unless theres something to worry about, but the bed wetting thing is what drove me to ask for thoughts.
Posts.Title: Possible Prostate Issue?
